SELECT BG_YOSAN_MEMO.YOSAN_HEAD_ID, BG_YOSAN_MEMO.MS_BUMON_ID, BG_YOSAN_MEMO.MEMO, BG_YOSAN_MEMO.RENEW_DATE, BG_YOSAN_MEMO.RENEW_USER_ID, BG_YOSAN_MEMO.TS
FROM BG_YOSAN_MEMO
WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT BG_YOSAN_MEMO.YOSAN_HEAD_ID, BG_YOSAN_MEMO.MS_BUMON_ID, BG_YOSAN_MEMO.MEMO, BG_YOSAN_MEMO.RENEW_DATE, BG_YOSAN_MEMO.RENEW_USER_ID, BG_YOSAN_MEMO.TS
FROM BG_YOSAN_MEMO WHERE (BG_YOSAN_MEMO.YOSAN_HEAD_ID = :YOSAN_HEAD_ID) AND (BG_YOSAN_MEMO.MS_BUMON_ID = :MS_BUMON_ID)
INSERT INTO BG_YOSAN_MEMO( YOSAN_HEAD_ID, MS_BUMON_ID, MEMO, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES ( :YOSAN_HEAD_ID, :MS_BUMON_ID, :MEMO, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )
UPDATE BG_YOSAN_MEMO SET MEMO = :MEMO, RENEW_DATE= :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE (YOSAN_HEAD_ID = :YOSAN_HEAD_ID) AND (MS_BUMON_ID = :MS_BUMON_ID) AND (TS = :TS)
